description:
Mod to send wallet overflow to the bank without needing to return to Clock Town. Additionally,
send and retrieve from the bank anywhere in Termina!

Remote Bank Inputs:
- L+A for deposit
- L+B for withdrawal
- L+R to reset bank to 10 under the most recent reward milestone.
- - After passing the 1000 rupee deposit milestone, the bank will only
reset back to 990 if you are above 1000.
short_description: They're your rupees, use them when you need!
